entry.content:
Cry it out: A healthy response to your damaged ego

Feeling upset because you can’t objectify women anymore?

That’s okay.

Crying is a perfectly healthy way to process emotions. Admitting that you wanted to hurt others is the first step toward growth.

Sad? Good. That’s your conscience waking up.
